original: Edestrand, Sven Eric, jur. kand., Borgholm, f. 11/4/15 i Kalmar av fabr. Ivar E. o. Anna Hällsén. G. 43 m. Birgit Kristenson. Barn: Hans f. 46. — Stud:ex. i Kalm. 34, språkstud. i Lund 35-37, jur. kand. i Lund 45. Tingsnot :asp. i Flundre, Väne o. Bjär-ke här. doms. 45-46, tjg. h. led. av Sv:es adv:samf. 46, tingsnot :asp. i Ölands doms. 46, tingsnot. där 46-47. Inneh. av Borgholms jur. byrå fr. 47. Omb. f. köpm:fören:a o. f. Smål. m. fl. prov. hypifören. i Växjö. Medl. av Lunds stud isångfören. 38-44. Hob-bies : sång, musik, motionsidr.
translated: Edestrand, Sven Eric, a law graduate, from Borgholm, born on April 11th, 1915 in Kalmar to manufacturer Ivar E. and Anna Hällsén. Married in 1943 to Birgit Kristenson. They have one child, Hans, born in 1946. Sven Eric completed his high school education in Kalmar in 1934, studied languages in Lund from 1935-1937, and obtained his law degree in Lund in 1945. He served as a junior judge in Flundre, Väne, and Bjärke district courts from 1945-1946 and was a member of the Swedish Bar Association from 1946. He also worked as a junior judge in Öland's district courts in 1946, and then served there from 1946-1947. Since 1947, he has been the owner of the Borgholm law firm. He was a representative for the merchants' association and the Småland province mortgage association in Växjö. He was also a member of Lund's student singing association from 1938-1944. Sven Eric's hobbies include singing, music, and sports.

structured.name: Sven Eric Edestrand
structured.description: Sven Eric Edestrand was a Swedish lawyer and member of various organizations. He owned the Borgholm Law Firm and had hobbies such as singing, music, and sports.
